title: Noam Chomsky – Was the Bombing of Hiroshima Necessary?
description:
In an interview for the award-winning documentary “Children of Armageddon”, philosopher Noam Chomsky talks about nuclear weapons. In this part, he questions the narrative that the use of the nuclear bomb on Hiroshima and Nagasaki was necessary to end World War II and that it saved millions of lives.
